matches.reasoning: The bank entry for Honey Inc. on 01/01/2025 matches the GL entries for the same date with the same amount of $1050. The descriptions also align with the transaction involving Honey Inc.
The bank entry for Bee Inc. on 01/02/2025 matches the GL entries for the same date with the same amount of $1100. The descriptions indicate a transaction with Bee Inc., confirming the match.
The bank entry for Goodies Inc. on 01/07/2025 matches the GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $2000. The description clearly indicates a payment from Goodies Inc.
The bank entry for Baddies Wire on 01/08/2025 matches the GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $2000. The description aligns with a payment from Baddies Inc.
The bank entry for Goodies Inc. on 01/09/2025 matches the GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $3000. The description confirms it is the remaining payment from Goodies Inc.

The bank entry for Kings Inc. on 01/13/2025 is a low confidence match with the GL entry on 01/11/2025 for $1000. The amount matches, and the description suggests a payment related to Kings Inc., but the date discrepancy suggests a processing delay.

The bank entry for K-Foods on 01/13/2025 with an amount of -$100 does not have a corresponding GL entry. The negative amount and lack of matching description suggest it might be an adjustment or unrelated transaction.
